at.ac.acdh.profile_parser

Class ParsedProfileFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.acdh.profile_parser.ParsedProfileFactory

  • public class ParsedProfileFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is responsible for creating proper parser, based on CMDI version, and to return instance of ParsedProfile to caller.

    Author:
    dostojic

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static ProfileParser createParser(java.lang.String url) 
      static ParsedProfile parse(java.lang.String url, boolean withNamespace)
      This method creates instance of ProfileParser based on CMDI version in passed url and calls its method ProfileParser.parse(String, boolean) to create parsed instance object.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static ParsedProfile parse(java.lang.String url,
                                  boolean withNamespace)
                           throws com.ximpleware.VTDException
        This method creates instance of ProfileParser based on CMDI version in passed url and calls its method ProfileParser.parse(String, boolean) to create parsed instance object. If parsing was successful an instance of ParsedProfile is returned to the user
        Parameters:
        url - - URL of a profile's XSD
        withNamespace - - should construct xpaths with namespace
        Returns:
        an instance of ParsedProfile
        Throws:
        com.ximpleware.VTDException - if parsing of XSD fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if unable to determinate CMDI version from url

      • createParser

        private static ProfileParser createParser(java.lang.String url)
